articles.title: Supercomputer forecasts Argentina's 2022 FIFA World Cup triumph
articles.description: The 2022 FIFA World Cup will be won by Argentina, according to a supercomputer
articles.content:
Supercomputer suggests that Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo will face off against each
BCA Research used a sample of 192 group stage matches and 64 knockout rounds from the 2006, 2010, 2014, and 2018 FIFA World Cup

articles.title: As BTS Jin prepares for military service, fans stand with 'ARMY will wait for you' boards at concert
articles.description: Ahead of BTS' Jin's military service enlistment, the K-pop star performed at a Coldplay concert in Argentina. The event saw BTS ARMY lining up to see the Korean star performing on the stage. Many stood with boards that read, 'ARMY will wait for you.' The videos and photos have gone viral.
articles.content:
Follow us on Image Source : TWITTER/UUU_NITNITAA,KIMSTERW BTS Jin performing The Astronaut at Coldplay concert

articles.description: Lionel Messi has been in stunning form with Paris Saint-Germain and Argentina in 2022
articles.content:

articles.title: Lacking Expensive Army Bombs, BTS Fans Create Their Own
articles.description: Many fans in Argentina dream of having a BTS light stick one day. It's not easy, though. ARMY bombs are expensive in the economically battered country.
articles.content: Last week, BTS fans in Argentina got an unexpected but joyous piece of news. Kim Seok-jin, more commonly known as Jin, the oldest member of the South Korean K-Pop group, would be performing his new single “The Astronaut” for the first time as a speci... [6026 chars]

articles.title: Argentina strikes $2 bln Paris Club debt deal
articles.description: Argentina reached a deal to restructure some $1.97 billion it owes the Paris Club, Argentina's government and the creditor group said on Friday, which will push repayments back as far as 2028 and bring relief of some $248 million to the country.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES/LONDON, Oct 28 (Reuters) - Argentina reached a deal to restructure some $1.97 billion it owes the Paris Club, Argentina's government and the creditor group said on Friday, which will push repayments back as far as 2028 and bring relief o... [2198 chars]

articles.title: Manuel Turizo’s ‘La Bachata’ Tops Argentina Hot 100 Chart for 7th Week
articles.description: Manuel Turizo’s “La Bachata” notches a seventh week at No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart (dated Oct. 22).
